item.title: Using Julia for Data Science
item.description: This a quick introduction to the Julia programming language. The aim of this post is to present to you how you can easily install and work rightaway with datasets with Julia. Why Julia? Glad you asked! Julia is a high level programming language released in 2012 by a team of MIT researchers. Since its beginning, the aim was to solve the so called two-language programing problem: easy to use functionalities of interpretable languages (Python, R, Matlab) vs high performance of compiled languages (C, C++, Fortran).
